name: Rex Wilder
bio: Rex Wilder is the author of Open Late: New & Collected Poems 1979–2018, Boomerangs in the Living Room (2013), and Waking Bodies (2006). His work has appeared in Poetry, the Times Literary Supplement, the Yale Review, and The Nation. Wilder is a former editorial assistant for Poetry. He served as regional director of the Poetry Society of America in Los Angeles, California, where he helped establish Hollywood’s “Act of the Poet” reading series. He lives in Venice, California.
